document_data.caption: A map showing a portion of Ivory Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Ivory Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Ivory Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Ivory Street was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It originated on [[Diamond Street]] where it branched west, crossing the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]] where it turned northwest to end on the western edge of the [[Street of Glances]]. Ivory Street was intersected by [[Sighing Maiden's Walk]], [[Flint Street]], [[the Skulkway]], [[Bliss Street]], [[Ignorance Alley]], the [[Street of Whispers]], and [[Torch Lane]].
